name: MadWorld: Early Access
description:
Welcome to this Early Access preview of MadWorld. Join the community to share tactics and chat with the developers about upcoming features and more here: discord.gg/MadWorld

MadWorld works with: iPhone SE, 6S, 6S Plus, 7, 7 Plus, 8, 8 Plus, X, XS, XR, iPad mini 4, iPad Air 2, 3, iPad Pro, 11, 11pro, 11max, 12, 12 Pro, 12 Max, 13, 13 Pro, 13 Max

EARLY ACCESS
Early Access means it's an early build, so it’s gonna get a little weird. We appreciate all of your feedback and support as we work to make MadWorld awesome. Other things that will happen during Early Access: things will be broken, things will get deleted, things will be nerfed & buffed, features will get added (or removed), we will also need to occasionally reset everyone’s accounts… Sorry!

GAME OVERVIEW
Lead your squad to victory through intense fire-fights across a variety of challenging game modes; designed for mobile gaming. Death match? Control? Quick match? Clan vs. Clan? Pillage resources? Daily events deliver all the new and familiar game modes you’re looking for.

LEAD OR JOIN A CLAN & TAKE TERRITORY
Find friends, battle together, and build your reputation by winning territory and clan battles. Become infamous to earn the right to fight against the best of the best! Control territory to ascend to the tops of the leaderboards!

GAME EVENTS & MAP
With the fall of society, comes a fresh opportunity to resettle the world. The world may look familiar, but new clans and organizations have taken over - this is your shot; join one and grow it from within, or form a new Clan and take over the map! Savvy players will check often to find new missions, war developments, and more!

STRATEGIZE WITH SQUADMATES
You are not alone! Strategize with allies and choose from a roster of character classes to join you in battle. Use the tactical map (TacMap) to command your Ai-driven squamates to capture points, extract resources, or recon areas. Character classes matter! Medics revive and can be requested to heal allies. Heavies can suppress enemies allowing for flank attacks or escaping from danger. Snipers can overwatch an area and drastically damage enemies with a headshot.

UPGRADE YOUR CHARACTER AND YOUR SQUAD
Earn weapons, gear, and experience to upgrade multiple character classes. Level-up to get more powerful and have a chance for unique character traits. Score loot from winning matches to hunt for better weapons and equipment. Swap out weapon types from short-range shotguns to long-range sniper rifles and lots in between. Earn additional squadmates to expand your roster to have the tools to handle any enemy encounter.

DAILY EVENTS & WAR
Check back often for multiple daily events & challenges. As we grow and build the game together, look f or new features like Clan Wars and Territory Control!

Discord: https://discord.gg/MadWorld

PLEASE NOTE
- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your iTunes account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting device settings.
- This game is not intended for children.
- Advertising appears in this game.
- A network connection is required to play.
- This game may permit users to interact with one another (e.g., chat rooms, player to player messaging). Linking to social networking sites are not intended for persons in violation of the applicable rules of such social networking sites.
- If you have a problem with this game, please use the game’s “Help” feature, or message us on Discord.
